input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Palm Springs Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Northern Depths Stripe Sweater Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Yale Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Essential T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Knit Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Cloud Long Sleeve Henley'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Sunwashed Slub Crew'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Jalen Brunson X Captain Clutch Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Shorelite Long-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Cloud Waffle Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Short'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed V-Neck Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Legend Baseball Sweater Crew'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Legend&Trade; Surf Stripe Sweater Hoodie'
  - Name='Faherty Women's Mikki Henley'
  - Name='tentree Men's Short Sleeve Den T-Shirt'
  - Name='Outerknown Tom Blake Waikiki Tee'
  - Name='Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Henley'
  - Name='Pact Organic Men's Featherweight V-Neck Tee'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are heavyweight casual cotton T-shirts designed for frequent wear, sharing similar material type and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Palm Springs Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve cotton T-shirt but likely lighter weight and possibly less tailored compared to the heavyweight shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar materials and style but long-sleeve instead of short sleeve; otherwise close in function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Pocket Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve cotton tee with similar construction and casual use; pocket detail adds minor difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve heavyweight cotton tee, similar materials but different sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Movement Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a performance fabric T-shirt differing from heavyweight organic cotton construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Northern Depths Stripe Sweater Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweater shirt is a heavier knit and different category altogether, less similar in silhouette and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar material and construction but V-neck style differs from the crew neck shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Yale Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard cotton T-shirt similar in function but unknown specific construction weight or tailoring.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Regenerative Essential T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's T-shirt likely similar material but potentially different fit and cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Knit Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shirt likely has button front and lighter construction, different style than heavyweight tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Cloud Long Sleeve Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Henley style with button placket and long sleeves differs from basic heavyweight tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Sunwashed Slub Crew
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck and cotton material similar, but slub fabric and women's cut reduce relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Jalen Brunson X Captain Clutch Sunwashed Pocket T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cotton pocket tee, similar style and materials to shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Shorelite Long-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve tech fabric T-shirt differs in material and intended use from heavyweight cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Long-Sleeve Cloud Waffle Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve waffle knit cotton crew, similar in style but different knit and sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unrelated product category (shorts) with no relevancy to a tee shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed V-Neck Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton short sleeve V-neck tee close in material and construction but V-neck shape differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Legend Baseball Sweater Crew
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sweater crew suggests heavier knit outerwear, significantly different from cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Women's Mikki Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Henley neck and women's fit differ from heavyweight crew neck shop tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: tentree Men's Short Sleeve Den T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cotton T-shirt similar in intended use but unknown specific weight or construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Outerknown Tom Blake Waikiki Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve casual cotton tee similar in use and silhouette, but less info on fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Essential Organic Garment-Dyed Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton like shop tee but Henley style differs in neckline and button placket.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pact Organic Men's Featherweight V-Neck Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also organic cotton but featherweight and V-neck, differing in fabric weight and neckline.
